sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import styles from "./Dialogs.module.css";
import {Col, Row} from "react-bootstrap";
import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom";

const DialogItem = (props) =>{
    return(
        <Row>
            <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog}><NavLink to={'/dialog/' + props.id}>{props.name}</NavLink></Col>
        </Row>
        )
}
const Dialogs = (props) => {
    return (
            <Row >
                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialogs}>
                    <Row>
                        <Col xs='4' className={styles.dialogItems}>
                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog + ' ' + styles.active}>Dialogs</Col>
                            </Row>

                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog}><NavLink to='/dialog/1'>Vanya</NavLink></Col>
                            </Row>
                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog}><NavLink to='/dialog/1'>Katya</NavLink></Col>
                            </Row>
                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog}><NavLink to='/dialog/1'>Maxim</NavLink></Col>
                            </Row>
                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog}><NavLink to='/dialog/1'>Sveta</NavLink></Col>
                            </Row>
                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.dialog}><NavLink to='/dialog/1'>Natasha</NavLink></Col>
                            </Row>
                        </Col>
                        <Col xs='8' className={styles.messages}>
                            <Row>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.message}>Hi</Col>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.message}>How are you?</Col>
                                <Col xs='12' className={styles.message}>Im fine. What about you?</Col>
                            </Row>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                </Col>
            </Row>
    );
}
export default Dialogs;
